casebody.data:
C-207 Sept. Term 2017
079584 Supreme Court of New Jersey. October 20, 2017

IN RE Appeal of The APPLICATION FOR NJ FIREARMS PURCHASER ID CARD, et al.

(Mark Scott-Petitioner)

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000845-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
